```{r}
x<-seq(1,30)
x
length(x)
sum(x)

ch_vector <- c("Asuna","Kirito","Yuki","Leefa")
ch_vector
length(ch_vector)

print("Answer: You cannot add up a vector of strings but you can add up a sequence of numbers")

x_2<-seq(1,5)
x_2
x_3<-seq(6,10)
x_3
sum_v <- x_2 + x_3
sum_v

product_v <- x_2 * x_3
product_v

c(x_2,x_3)

matrix_v<-rbind(c(1:5), c(6:10), c(product_v))
matrix_v

matrix_df <- as.data.frame(matrix_v)
matrix_df
```

```{r}

object2 <- as_tibble(object1)
arrange(object2, desc(Year))
```
